com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.io.storage.filetypes

Class TextureImageFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.io.storage.GameFile
      • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.io.storage.filetypes.TextureImageFile

  • public class TextureImageFile
extends GameFile
    File with the following structure: ByteLoc : Description 0 (byte) : 1 if Bitmap Type, 2 if ETC1 Type 1 (?) : The texture image data. See BitmapTexType and ETC1TexType for information on how the data is stored.
    Author:
    jlreyes
